00006 | Algorith Visualization Data                                                  |
00007 | Privides Vi(sual)Data classes that behave like standard Abstract Data Types  |
00008 | but also have methods for Rendering them on the screen.                      |

00014 #include "av_system.h"
00015 #include <vector>

00017 enum DataOrder { doSorted = 0, doReversed, doRandomized, doSpecialRandomized };
00018 const char strDataOrderNames[4][24] = { "Sorted", "Reversed", "Randomized", "Special Randomized" };

00020 // the CViData base abstract class --------------------------------------------+
00021 class CViData {
00022 public:
00023         CViData() { }
00024         virtual ~CViData() { }
00025 
00026         virtual void Render(CAVSystem *avSystem) = 0;
00027 };

00029 // the CViArray class ---------------------------------------------------------+
00030 // it beheaves like the std::vector class but it has ability to be drawn by
00031 // CAVSystem class
00032 template <class T>
00033 class CViArray : public CViData {
00034 public:
00035         CViArray(int iSize);
00036         CViArray(): m_iLast(0), m_iLast2(-1), m_iL(-1), m_iR(-1) { }
00037         ~CViArray();
00038 
00039         void Render(CAVSystem *avSystem);
00040 
00041         void Generate(DataOrder dOrder);
00042         void Resize(int iSize) { m_vArray.resize(iSize); m_iLast2 = -1; }
00043         void SetSection(int iLeft, int iRight) { m_iL = iLeft; m_iR = iRight; }
00044         void SetAdditionalMark(int iId) { m_iLast2 = iId; }
00045         int GetSize() { return (int)m_vArray.size(); }
00046 
00047         const T& operator [] (int iId) const;
00048         T& operator [] (int iId);
00049         void Func(T obj);
00050 private:
00051         std::vector<T> m_vArray;
00052         int m_iLast;
00053         int m_iLast2;
00054         int m_iL, m_iR;         // highlighted section - left and right
00055 };
00056

00061 // constructor:
00062 template <class T>
00063 CViArray<T>::CViArray(int iSize) {
00064         m_vArray.resize(iSize);
00065         m_iLast = 0;
00066         m_iLast2 = 0;
00067         m_iR = -1;
00068         m_iL = -1;
00069         m_iE1 = -1;
00070         m_iE2 = -1;
00071         m_bWasExchanged = false;
00072 }
00073

00075 template <class T>
00076 CViArray<T>::~CViArray() {
00077 
00078 }
00079 
00080 // Render method --------------------------------------------------------------+
00081 template <class T>
00082 void CViArray<T>::Render(CAVSystem *avSystem) {
00083         ColorType ct;
00084         avSystem->BeginDrawing(m_vArray.begin(), m_vArray.end(), 1.0, (int)m_vArray.size());
00085         for (int i = 0; i < (int)m_vArray.size(); ++i) {
00086         ct = ctNormal;
00087                 if (i >= m_iL && i <= m_iR) ct = ctHighlighted;
00088                 if (i == m_iLast || i == m_iLast2) ct = ctMarked;
00089                 avSystem->DrawDiagramBlock((double)m_vArray[i], ct);
00090         }
00091         avSystem->EndDrawing();
00092 }
00093 
00094 // Ganerate method ------------------------------------------------------------+
00095 template <class T>
00096 void CViArray<T>::Generate(DataOrder dOrder) {
00097         T tAsp = (T)(1.0/(double)m_vArray.size());
00098         switch ( dOrder ) {
00099                 case doSorted: {
00100                         for (size_t i = 0; i < m_vArray.size(); ++i)
00101                                 m_vArray[i] = (T)(tAsp*(double)(i+1));
00102                         break;
00103                         }
00104            case doReversed: {
00105                         for (size_t i = 0; i < m_vArray.size(); ++i)
00106                                 m_vArray[i] = (T)(1.0 - tAsp*(double)(i));
00107                         break;
00108                         }
00109            case doRandomized: {
00110                         for (size_t i = 0; i < m_vArray.size(); ++i)
00111                                 m_vArray[i] = (T)(((double)rand()/RAND_MAX)*(double)i*tAsp);
00112                         break;
00113                         }
00114            case doSpecialRandomized: {
00115                         for (size_t i = 0; i < m_vArray.size(); ++i)
00116                                 m_vArray[i] = (T)(tAsp*(double)(i+1));
00117                         for (size_t i = 0; i < 10*m_vArray.size(); ++i) {
00118                                 int a = rand()%(int)m_vArray.size();
00119                                 int b = rand()%(int)m_vArray.size();
00120                                 Swap(m_vArray[a], m_vArray[b]);
00121                         }
00122                         break;
00123                 }
00124         }
00125         m_iLast2 = -1;
00126 }
00127 
00128 // the [] operator ------------------------------------------------------------+
00129 template <class T>
00130 const T& CViArray<T>::operator [] (int iId) const {
00131         if (iId >= m_vArray.size()) return m_vArray[m_vArray.size()-1];
00132         m_iLast = iId;
00133         return m_vArray[iId];
00134 }
00135 
00136 // the [] operator ------------------------------------------------------------+
00137 template <class T>
00138 T& CViArray<T>::operator [] (int iId) {
00139         if (iId >= (int)m_vArray.size()) return m_vArray[m_vArray.size()-1];
00140         m_iLast = iId;
00141         return m_vArray[iId];
00142 }
